git/gitnote.html.title: LearnGit
git/gitnote.html.body:
本地新建及初始化
$ mkdir learngit
$ cd learngit
$ git init

关联GitHub
$ git remote add [Your GitHub Repertories]

提交推送
$ git add .
$ git commit -m "what's change"
$ git push orgin branch

创建分支
$ git checkout orphan gh-pages

切换分支
git checkout master

SQL/.title: SQL_Note
SQL/.body:
Here is my SQL note, and I also will share some knowledge about SQL.
Besides, I'd like to tell you some intersting things happened in my SQL class.

SQL/LearnMySql.html.title: LearnMySql
SQL/LearnMySql.html.body:
利用Doker实现局部安装MySql Server
参考链接：

http://blog.knowncold.me/2017/09/16/docker-sql-server
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/linux/sql-server-linux-configure-docker

Windows：

1、以下均使用管理员模式下的powershall或cmd
2、Docker在windows上是运行在hyper-v上的，所以家庭版没有hyper-v是无法使用


安装Doker
将Doker内存调制4GB
拉取镜像
$ docker pull microsoft/mssql-server-linux  //部分地区需要翻墙——全局代理


运行镜像//windows下将 ' ' 改为 " "
$ docker run -e 'ACCEPT_EULA=Y' -e 'MSSQL_SA_PASSWORD=' -e 'MSSQL_PID=Developer' --cap-add SYS_PTRACE -p 1401:1433 -d microsoft/mssql-server-linux


查看Doker容器$ docker ps -a


启动$ doker start e69e056c702d //container id 见上


链接到SQL Server$ docker exec -it e69e056c702d "bash"


本地链接$ /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U SA -P ''


进行数据库操作CREATE DATABASE
CREATE TABLE
SELECT * FROM
GO
QUIT


可视化工具链接
DataGrip

SQL/SQLServerNote.html.title: SQLServerNote
SQL/SQLServerNote.html.body:
SQL Server Note
 inventory 



id
name




1
Apple


2
Banana




SELECTSELECT id FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM inventory        //SELECT ALL
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM inventory      //去重，放在列之前


WHERE//条件
SELECT * FROM inventory
WHERE id = 1  ||  WHERE name = 'Apple'  ||  WHERE name is null






运算符
描述




<>
不等于


like
自定义




AND OR
NULL AND TRUE =NULL
NULL OR  FALSE= NULL


ORDER BY
ORDER BY 3,2


INSERT
INSERT INTO inventory VALUES (3, ' Banana')


GROUP BY

isnull()==nvl()

sal*12+isnull(comm ,0 ) as "Salary Of Year"
WHERE ENAME LIKE '__o%'
ORDER BY ID DESE OR ASC
MAX()   MIN()
ROUND( CAST ( COUNT (COMM) AS FLOAT) )/COUNT(*),12)
ROUND(NUM,12)
CAST(INT AS FLOAT)


GROUP BY DEPTON HAVING AVG(sal)
HAVING

SQL/firsthomework.html.title: Firsthomework
SQL/firsthomework.html.body:
4

SELECT ENAME,JOB,HIREDATE,SAL
FROM EMP
WHERE DEPTNO = 10



5

SELECT DISTINCT JOB
FROM EMP

6

SELECT ename,sal*12+isnull(comm,0)*12 as "Salary Of Year"
FROM EMP


7

SELECT ename, sal+ISNULL(comm,0) as total
FROM emp


8

SELECT ename, sal
FROM emp
WHERE JOB = 'MANAGER'


9

SELECT ename, sal
FROM emp
WHERE ENAME LIKE '__o%'

10



SELECT ename, sal ,JOB
FROM emp
WHERE JOB = 'SALESMAN' OR JOB = 'MANAGER'



11



SELECT ename
FROM emp
WHERE COMM IS NULL


12


SELECT ename ,SAL ,COMM
FROM emp
WHERE COMM IS NOT NULL


13


SELECT ename ,SAL  
FROM emp
ORDER BY SAL DESC


14
SELECT MAX(SAL) AS '最高工资' , min(sal) as '最低工资'
FROM emp



15

SELECT avg (sal) as '平均工资',SUM(sal) as '总计工资'
FROM emp



16

SELECT  ROUND(CAST (COUNT (COMM)AS FLOAT)/COUNT(*),12)
FROM emp


17
SELECT  JOB,AVG(SAL) AS AVERAGE
FROM emp
GROUP BY JOB

18


SELECT  DEPTNO,JOB,AVG(SAL) AS AVERAGE,MAX(SAL)
FROM emp
GROUP BY DEPTNO,JOB


19

SELECT  DEPTNO,AVG(SAL) AS AVERAGE,MAX(SAL) AS MAX
FROM emp
GROUP BY DEPTNO HAVING AVG(SAL)
